extendedInfo.description: Performance Based Marketing Is REALLY Now A Piece of Cake for Network Owners and Affiliates with the Cake Marketing Mobile Application. We are revolutionizing the way business is done online by allowing full access and control to network operations remotely. Receive real-time analytics, reporting, and perform many of the daily tasks all on your mobile device.The Cake Marketing Mobile Application provides both affiliate networks administrative functionality and access for their affiliates. With full roles access enabled both network owners and affiliates will only see their respective content.Network Owners- Input your domain, email and password and receive immediate access to dashboard statistics, full real-time reporting, contacts, and many of the features Cake provides. Need to contact an advertiser or affiliate? Go to the âLISTâ tab, search for the company to contact, then call or email directly from your iPhone. Want to be notified when a âCAPâ is about to reach its limit? Set up an email or text alert and then use the Cake Marketing Mobile Application to increase the âCAPâ or redirect the traffic to another offer. Affiliates- Input the networkâs domain, your email and password and receive access to ALL real-time reports.- Real-time analytics- Customized to match your corporate theme- Supports multiple languages and currencies- Provides one touch dial or email to contacts- Change or edit offer and campaign âCAPâ- Inactivate Offers, Campaigns, Advertisers, Affiliates, Sub-Affiliates- Send Creatives- Pixel Management- Add Campaigns- Approve Applied CampaignsRequires credentials to Cake Marketing for access. For more information www.cakemarketing.com or call 949-548-CAKE

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Full star just fucking good application ....IMO!
reviews.author: Madan Rawat

reviews.title: Helpful app
reviews.comment: This app is really helpful to check things quickly. The latest update fixed force close problems I was having and saved logins work now. Epc has never worked for me though, it always just shows 0.01. More in depth reporting like iOS version would be great. Subid report and conversion report with times would be awesome.
reviews.author: Drew Davidson

reviews.title: Force closed
reviews.comment: Forces close on ever open, opens fine on the second try. Nice and simple app to check stats
reviews.author: Josh Brewer
